trans-unit.source: Represents an assembly level attribute that is used to identify the value of the <see langword="RootNamespace" /> property in a Visual Studio project file.
trans-unit.target: 表示組件層級屬性，用來識別 Visual Studio 專案檔的 <see langword="RootNamespace" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is mainly relevant for type resolutions of partial classes by markup compilers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由標記編譯器的部分類別的型別解析的主要相關。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.RootNamespaceAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.RootNamespaceAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.RootNamespaceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that corresponds to the value of the <see langword="RootNamespace" /> property in a [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至 [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] 專案檔中 <see langword="RootNamespace" /> 屬性值的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string that corresponds to the value of the <see langword="RootNamespace" /> property in a [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] project file.
trans-unit.target: 對應至 [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/includes/vs-current-short-md.md)] 專案檔中 <see langword="RootNamespace" /> 屬性值的字串。
